page_content: The page discusses the legal framework for the protection of nature and landscape in the Canton of Nidwalden.
The page provides a PDF guide on the protection of nature and landscape in the Canton of Nidwalden.
The page discusses the remediation of negative impacts on water bodies due to hydroelectric power usage in the Canton of Nidwalden.
The page focuses on occupational safety and health regulations in businesses within the Canton of Nidwalden.
The page discusses noise pollution from road traffic and the measures taken for its mitigation in the Canton of Nidwalden.
The page outlines the responsibilities of tank facility owners in the Canton of Nidwalden, focusing on environmental protection and regular maintenance.
The page provides information on a Landrat (Cantonal Parliament) meeting, including an agenda item about software for electronic tax record archiving.
The page discusses the accessibility features of the Canton of Nidwalden's website, including compliance with international guidelines and the use of XHTML and CSS for structure and design.
The page provides a guide on learning German as a second language, issued by the Office for Primary Schools and Sports.
The page details the services offered by the Canton of Nidwalden's Commercial Register, including registration procedures and legal obligations.
The page provides a PDF guide for installing a hunting application, managed by the Office for Justice.
The page discusses the continuing education programs for teachers in the Canton of Nidwalden, organized by the Office for Primary Schools and Sports.
The page discusses the strategic planning for the revitalization of flowing waters in the Canton of Nidwalden, in compliance with federal regulations.
The page discusses the legal and environmental considerations for construction activities affecting groundwater in the Canton of Nidwalden.
The page provides an overview of important archival terms and their organization within the State Archives of Nidwalden.
The page discusses noise pollution caused by railways in the Canton of Nidwalden and the measures taken for its mitigation.
The page discusses invasive organisms, specifically non-native plants and animals, and the measures taken for their control in the Canton of Nidwalden.
